column4: After an release upgrade GDM was replaced with unity-greeter (GDM seems to be broken now) and unity-greeter does not allow me to login as user "clint".  What is the issue?
OK.  Maybe I should give that a try?  Any ideas why user wouldn't be listed?  I suppose I could create a new one..
what is not listed? a normal user account? what is the uid of that user?
